title: A Lesson from Traveling
description: Lina shares a travel experience and what she learned from it.
speaker: Lina
text: Last summer, I traveled alone to a country I had never visited before.
I was excited about the trip, but also a little nervous because everything was new to me.
On my first day, I got lost while trying to find my hotel.
My phone battery died, and I could not use maps or translation apps.
At first, I felt stressed and unsure of what to do.
After a few minutes, I decided to ask local people for help.
Even though my language skills were limited, they were kind and patient.
In the end, I reached my hotel safely and felt proud of myself.
This experience taught me that staying calm and open-minded can help solve unexpected problems.
